title: Abyssal Kraken
text: The Abyssal Kraken is a legend of the high seas, a monster so large it can wrap its tentacles around a galleon and drag it under. It dwells in the deepest trenches, where the pressure is enough to crush steel. Its eyes glow with a hypnotic light that lures sailors to their doom. It is an ancient beast, rumored to be one of the original spawn of the deep waters.
image_prompt: A dangerous Beast creature known as Abyssal Kraken. A colossal squid with glowing eyes and spiked tentacles.
name: Abyssal Kraken
description: A Beast known as Abyssal Kraken that drags ships to the depths.
